name: phaser2_template
description: A Typescript template for HTML5 games using the Phaser game engine. The files included are a mixture of of the basic template provided in the [phaser-ce](https://github.com/photonstorm/phaser-ce) repository and the [Advanced Phaser and Typescript Projects](http://www.photonstorm.com/phaser/advanced-phaser-and-typescript-projects) tutorial provided on the Photon Storm blog.
author: Marcelo
